import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './nav-menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav-menu.component.css'] }) export class NavbarComponent { isSlideOutVisible = false; toggleSlideOut() { this.isSlideOutVisible = !this.isSlideOutVisible; } }
